iti33:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti33:2.1: “Mendicants, a person with two qualities is raised up to heaven.
iti33:2.4: A person who has these two qualities is is raised up to heaven.”
iti33:2.5: That is what the Buddha said.
iti33:3.5: when their body breaks up, that wise person
iti33:4.1: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
